name: Savers
defined_by: A tendency to spend generously on others
means_for_money: Spreading the financial love with others may stretch you thin with little money left to save

tips.title: Launch a money-saving challenge
tips.description: Give friends and family a heads-up that you’re focusing on saving and ask them to join in. When your tendency to treat others arises, you’ll have a support system helping to curb the behavior

tips.title: Give yourself spending limits for gifts
tips.description: Shopping with only a set amount of cash on hand may help to keep overspending inclinations in check

name: Shopper
defined_by: Spending that’s driven by a desire to keep up with the latest trends
means_for_money: The focus on right now can potentially leave you unprepared for emergencies or longer-term goals such as retirement

tips.title: Institute a 48-hour rule before you buy
tips.description: Delaying gratification gives you a cooling-off period to think the purchase through and determine if it’s something you really need

tips.title: Consider using a shopping app that tracks items on your to-buy list
tips.description: Look for one that shoots you a heads-up when a must-have item goes on sale

name: Big Spender
defined_by: Buying smaller items you don’t necessarily need, on impulse
means_for_money: Small purchases can eventually add up to one big shortfall in your savings plan

tips.title: Create a savings match
tips.description: Each time you spend $5 on a magazine or $2 on a candy bar, transfer that same amount to your savings

tips.title: Check retailer return policies
tips.description: Consider using apps to help keep track of purchases and receipts — which typically include return policies — so you can view them at a glance

name: Debtor
defined_by: Buying smaller items you don’t necessarily need, on impulse
means_for_money: Small purchases can eventually add up to one big shortfall in your savings plan

tips.title: Create a savings match
tips.description: Each time you spend $5 on a magazine or $2 on a candy bar, transfer that same amount to your savings

tips.title: Check retailer return policies
tips.description: Consider using apps to help keep track of purchases and receipts — which typically include return policies — so you can view them at a glance
